subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: An object that defines configuration properties for the CircularGauge UI component.

subMembers.name: centerComponent
subMembers.description: An alias for the [centerTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.name: centerRender
subMembers.description: An alias for the [centerTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.name: centerTemplate
subMembers.description: Specifies a custom template for content in the component's center.

subMembers.name: endAngle
subMembers.description: Specifies the end angle of the circular gauge's arc.

subMembers.name: geometry
subMembers.description: Specifies the properties required to set the geometry of the CircularGauge UI component.

subMembers.name: startAngle
subMembers.description: Specifies the start angle of the circular gauge's arc.

subMembers.name: orientation
subMembers.description: Specifies the orientation of the range container in the CircularGauge UI component.

subMembers.name: rangeContainer
subMembers.description: Specifies gauge range container properties.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies the range container's width in pixels.

subMembers.name: hideFirstOrLast
subMembers.description: Specifies which label to hide in case of overlapping.

subMembers.name: indentFromTick
subMembers.description: Specifies the spacing between scale labels and ticks.

subMembers.name: label
subMembers.description: Specifies common properties for scale labels.

subMembers.name: orientation
subMembers.description: Specifies the orientation of scale ticks.

subMembers.name: scale
subMembers.description: Specifies a gauge's scale properties.

subMembers.name: subvalueIndicator
subMembers.description: Specifies the appearance properties of subvalue indicators.

subMembers.name: type
subMembers.description: Specifies the type of subvalue indicators.

subMembers.name: type
subMembers.description: Specifies the value indicator type.

subMembers.name: valueIndicator
subMembers.description: Specifies the appearance properties of the value indicator.

subMembers.name: Indicator Types
subMembers.description: This section lists objects that define properties used to configure value and subvalue indicators of specific types.

subMembers.name: RangeBar
subMembers.description: An object that defines a gauge indicator of the **rangeBar** type.

subMembers.name: RectangleNeedle
subMembers.description: An object that defines a gauge indicator of the **rectangleNeedle** type.

subMembers.name: TextCloud
subMembers.description: An object that defines a gauge indicator of the **textCloud** type.

subMembers.name: TriangleMarker
subMembers.description: An object that defines a gauge indicator of the **triangleMarker** type.

subMembers.name: TriangleNeedle
subMembers.description: An object that defines a gauge indicator of the **triangleNeedle** type.

subMembers.name: TwoColorNeedle
subMembers.description: An object that defines a gauge indicator of the **twoColorNeedle** type.

properties.name: dxCircularGauge
properties.description: The CircularGauge is a UI component that indicates values on a circular numeric scale.

Events.name: onDisposing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is [disposed of].md '{basewidgetpath}/Methods/#dispose').

Events.name: onDrawn
Events.description: A function that is executed when the UI component's rendering has finished.

Events.name: onExported
Events.description: A function that is executed after the UI component is exported.

Events.name: onExporting
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is exported.

Events.name: onFileSaving
Events.description: A function that is executed before a file with exported UI component is saved to the user's local storage.

Events.name: onIncidentOccurred
Events.description: A function that is executed when an error or warning occurs.

Events.name: onInitialized
Events.description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the UI component instance.

Events.name: onOptionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after a UI component property is changed.

Events.name: onTooltipHidden
Events.description: A function that is executed when a tooltip becomes hidden.

Events.name: onTooltipShown
Events.description: A function that is executed when a tooltip appears.

Types.name: CircularGaugeElementOrientation
Types.description: Specifies the orientation of scale ticks.

Types.name: CircularGaugeLabelOverlap
Types.description: Specifies which label to hide in case of overlapping.

Types.name: DisposingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [disposing] event handler's argument.

Types.name: DrawnEvent
Types.description: The type of the [drawn] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ExportedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [exported] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ExportingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [exporting] event handler's argument.

Types.name: FileSavingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [fileSaving] event handler's argument.

Types.name: IncidentOccurredEvent
Types.description: The type of the [incidentOccurred] event handler's argument.

Types.name: InitializedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [initialized] event handler's argument.

Types.name: OptionChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [optionChanged] event handler's argument.

subMembers.name: RangeContainer
subMembers.description: Specifies gauge range container properties.

subMembers.name: orientation
subMembers.description: Specifies the orientation of the range container in the CircularGauge UI component.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies the range container's width in pixels.

subMembers.name: Scale
subMembers.description: Specifies a gauge's scale properties.

subMembers.name: label
subMembers.description: Specifies common properties for scale labels.

subMembers.description: Specifies the orientation of scale ticks.

subMembers.description: Specifies common properties for scale labels.
